title: Bloomberg Markets: USTA's Widmaier on Open's Ground Improvement
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: USTA's Widmaier on Open's Ground Improvement
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Chris Widmaier Head of Communications United States Tennis Association Inc Discussing the transformation of the grounds at the USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center home of the U.S. Open.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
